channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!
item.author: Students

item.title: Golden Hour Dinners at Commons | Every Thursday
item.description: Looking for a laid-back dinner spot during the Summer? Borrow a picnic blanket from Commons, gather your friends, and join us at the Waterfall lawn every Thursday between 4:30-8PM during dinner! We will offer Vegetarian options as well as allergen free food from the Simple serving station.
item.author: Students

item.title: Early registration is open for Qiskit Global Summer School 2025
item.description:
Early registration is open for Qiskit Global Summer School 2025. Qiskit Global Summer School is an opportunity to learn quantum programming from researchers and programmers at IBM through live lectures, Q&A with experts, and programming challenges. Previous years’ lessons are available on the Qiskit YouTube Channel. This year’s theme is Qiskit Global Summer School 2025: The Past, Present, and Future of Quantum Computing. The class runs remotely July 7-22, 2025.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
